Reviews.Content: modern HeaveN ONLY 3 days2 nights, mehim, just a pleasure, tons of happy moments, sun on a luxury beach, marvelous huge swimming pool with well organized 鈥渇resh鈥?bar, enormous interior design manufactured by free mind, simply elegancy sunk in a pure quality, gorgeous atmosphere of balance in the air  the most delicious food we had during our November鈥檚 Vacation (even BurjiAlArab鈥檚 Al Muntaha restaurant was not that impressive). I will not mention the homemade delicious ice-cream, great brownie in Gourmand Deli 鈥?spa treatment with funny hotWAXsocks and very skilled stuff, private cute pool and huge bath 鈥? too much good things. I liked the wooden puzzles on the terraceBED and slow swing on the patch walk, soft bedding, taste of coffee, calm colors and the breath of ART in the air.the fireSHOW is very WOW, as the Kayuputi Restaurant - for dinner my bf will recommend DREAMY lobster, for breakfast Boneka with they fresh JUICE and REALLY yummy things 鈥?but think first what you want to eat and remember that breakfast makes your day - they will offer you hundred small complimentary things to try SWEETsaltySOURCEtaste 鈥?mixCOULDmakeYOUsick. Few warm words about people working there 鈥?perfectly trained for help BUT not to disturb (waiters are well prepared to help with the menu and be ready with suggestions, guards on the beach almost invisible, cleaning well done, fresh newspaper was hanging on the door every morning, laundry was delivered in a funny basket;) St. Rigin rules! OK 鈥?this Hotel is really NO 1 on my list and like no other 鈥?I wish to be back鈥? BuTthey have very poor list of movies, no one for a high lever cinema player .. well, fly for hours to magic Indonisia and then go for a movie :/ I know - it鈥檚 not a place for TV. But the room we had was a fairytale, the bed was perfect and there was a big LCD hanging on the wall 鈥?so we wanted to enjoy little lazy time;) We asked for late check out 鈥?No Problem 鈥?but they forgot to send that information to our key cards鈥?and we were back from the spa wearing only the bathrobes 鈥?hmm 鈥?just a bad coincident, I believe. Even the hotel is still under some decoration works it wasn鈥檛 heavy to bear. I miss the grand blue (azzuro;) swimming pool and that slow, calm sound in the air ... heavenly From the rainforest gate on the beginning to the car driving us to the airport everything was worth the word FABULOUSthank U honey; )
Reviews.Author: halfangel

Reviews.Content: One of the best breakfasts        Comfy bed but a little short
Reviews.Author: Yoyogi

Reviews.Content: A new beauty Went to St Regis Nusa Dua for four nights. When we arrived it was quiet impressive, overlooking the enormous fireplace that goes till the beach. The room was perfect, everything you can imagine was in the room, hat, beachbag, ...We had dinner at the beachrestaurant outside, verry romantic and good food. As we are Belgians it was a pitty they don't serve Eastern food but only European.The poolbar is also great, can sit in the pool or lounge at the beachside. Service at the beach was also perfect.Breakfast was very original. Every 5 minutes the waiter came with something else from croisant to eggs with caviar and it was also very trendy. There is also a buffet with everything you can imagine. A compliment to the chef and his staff.The service was superb everywhere, very friendly, helpfull, ....Jan and Catherine
Reviews.Author: vrcatherine

Reviews.Content: Luxury experience with excellent services It was our first visit after we have cancelled our wedding ceremony at Ritz Carlton 3 years ago because of the bombing. We always love bali, and visited there many times. So we decided to get it over with the sad memory and starts a new one.Our wonderful journey starts like this, as soon as we arrived, there were staff from the bali-concierge welcomed us and helped with the visa on arrival and baggage reclaims. While we were waiting at the lounge to chill out and have a refreshing drink. It would save you about 30 minutes and not being waited in a long queue without air-con. We were then greeted by the hotel representative and brought us to the nice Mercedes Benz, with a lovely car-seat prepared for my son. Served with a cold minty towel and a very tasty chocolate truffle. We were addressed by name by the guards when the car enter the gate and i was given a beautiful frangipani. When we arrived the hotel lobby, all the baggages are well taken care of and we could have a sip of ice tea and stunned by how nice the hotel is. The suite is very cosy with a large balcony and a lovely walk-in closet and with plentiful mineral water bottles are provided in the room. We just relaxed in the room for the first day, and ordered room services for most of the day also, with a 15 months can't sit still baby is not easy to eat in a restaurant. The food is tasty, pricey as expected but quite a bit small in portion, the main course somehow look like the size of tapas. And i guess they should put on more choices in the menu. Also the prices of food at the gourmet deli(where they serve some light food)being marked up too high and again in small portion. But the ice cream are totally yummy.On the next day, we started our day with a very sumptuous breakfast as described by the hotel. They have a buffet area for cheese, salads and bread, the waiters would bring around some freshly baked croissants, smoothies, salmon roll, bloody mary, bagel with cold cuts and many more and are different everyday. While u can order from the menu from oysters , foie gras with fried eggs, my favourite egg benedict, sushi, dim sum ( not quite taste right for me as a chinese),nasi goreng,chicken porridge (for my baby),oatmeal and can't list them all. They all tasted as great as it looks from the outside, with the relaxing music and the view overlooking the whole resort. It's by far the most delicious breakfast or brunch i have ever had, but also the services is impeccable. We were so filled up so could only feel like to have appetite again when it's about 3 to 4 pm. All staff are very well mannered and i was impressed by their English standard too. Every staff would greet and smile when they see you, for any requests , they would respond 'yes,certainly,my pleasure, u feel very much respected.We payed extra to stay for the last two nights at the Gardenia VIlla, after we've seen all other type of rooms by the staff on the first day. We decided to have our full indulgence in this stay. They all looks lovely, the suite with plunge pool is on the ground floor where the indoor size is about the same as the suite we have stayed, while they've a plunge pool and bale in the garden. It's actually quite nice that u can have the outdoor feeling, however, it's opposite where the sun is, so , it's quite dark and u cannot enjoy sunbathing. While the lagoon Villa and gardenia villa have a huge living room , oversized bathroom , beautiful garden, very comfortable bale, butler's quarter , kitchen, extra bathroom,but a however small in proportion's closet. The former one has a nice lagoon view where u can access the main pool easily, however, it's with much less privacy. The gardenia villa where we first had was absolutely too warm inside, they have sent someone to fix it, not really worked out. After two hours, the room had not cool down So we requested to change to other villa, and then they prepared two villas for us to choose whichever one we feels it's cooler. Very much appreciated how their arrangement. But problem seemed to come again, the tele in the living room was only in black and white . The staff couldn't get it fix after like 30 minutes, they decided to replace by another tele.Again, impressed they have done it this way. You know, it could happen on some hotels would just apologise and let it be. The main pool is very nice and quiet , they've staff to clean my sunglasses as well, however, the stone inside the pool is very rough and is dark in color which u would only noticed it after hurting by it, which left me wounded. And i have a lot of mosquito bites just by sitting at the sun bench in the beach at sunset for 5 minutes, seems to be still itchy now. And would suggest to have a kids room where children can around there and parents can have a quiet time in spa or a nice dinner. We've received a beautiful cake for our anniversary, thought if we might be upgraded when check in ,but no (greedy),haa. It's the thought that count but can make it more personal by putting a small note with it. The butler services was a good experience, u feel like being served and pampered at all time. The house keeping was also immaculate too, they tidied up the villa very efficiently. On the day of departure, we had our breakfast in the villa, for the services fee of 20USD, while we can be relaxed and wear the PJs to enjoy it and baby could sleep longer in bed. We had numerous of choices as if we have eaten at the restaurant, they delivered sharply on time and i think it's well worth the surcharge.We were then picked up by the butler to check out at the lobby, u can also have it done in the room or villa, but it's actually easier for both parties. Noted,they don't accept US dollars printed before 1996 or have chips. And sadly, we had to say goodbye to this beautiful hotel , the staff were there to show their warmest farewell with a bow. With a nice and comfy ride to the airport, even my cheeky monkey took a nap . And the hotel representative were there to help with your check in. He called the airline to have our boarding passes ready before we arrived,impressive. We had a unforgettable experience, the most luxury one at all time, and hubby said it's the best one we have had for the 50 trips we have made. The services standard is so high and flawless that i think only the Peninsula in HK is comparable but still not better. Love this hotel would definitely return soon , and it's a good time to visit where the hotel is still nice and quiet and staff are high in spirit. Hope they can maintain it well and be the best in Bali. And thank you for giving us a new happy memory of bali too.
Reviews.Author: IreneY105

Reviews.Content: A Dream Come True Impeccable service. Is more than excellent. Everything was simple perfect at St Regis Bali.I had my wedding on 14 Dec 08 at the St Regis Resort Bali. The experience was amazing. First class!Our wedding celebration at the chapel and terrace was so so beautiful. All our guests enjoyed themselves thoroughly. To me, this wedding was like a dream come true. I was like living in my dream. The d茅cor and setup was nice, the food fantastic, the service staff provided excellent service, everything went on so smoothly. I am still wondering how did the staff at St Regis manage to set up for the dinner within such a short time!!! Oh yes, we enjoyed our stay in the villas too. Great experience.The head chef who helped deliver the nice food on the wedding day. Simply delicious and the service was again, above what we expected. Esp when one of our guests requested for a very simple dish (cooked sweet potatoes) for her babies, the staff was so kind to agree to the request and came back with something so nicely done (when we only required something really simple).Thanks for the great St Regis experience at St Regis Bali!!!We will be back鈥?/p>
Reviews.Author: bkoon

Reviews.Content: Fantastic hotel experience Looking for some luxury accommodation after a disappointing return to Four Seasons at Jimbaran Bay - fantastic accommodation in pool villa, attentive staff and wonderful food. The breakfast has to be experienced to be believed. Can't wait to go back next year
Reviews.Author: PerfectionistUK

Reviews.Content: Beautiful  The St.Regis resort in Nusa Dua was abosulutely stunning! We were here for our honeymoon and had a wonderful time. The pick-up service was great at the airport. They actually do all the work for you (ie immigration, customs,  collect luggage). We stayed in one of the private pool villas that opened up into the lagoons and pretty much spent most of our afternoons in the cabanas reading and listening to music (they have a bose ipod hookup, so BRING YOUR IPOD!). There are some kinks that need to be worked out. I think the menu for the in room dining needs to be reviewed and also the experience of their staff. The highlight of our stay was when the Executive Chef (Oscar) prepared a special indian cuisine for my husband and I at the beachside restaurant. It was AMAZING. Not only was everything custom made to our taste but the venue and the setting of the entire restaurant was gorgeous, something out of a movie!Overall, the hotel was amazing and will definately come back!
Reviews.Author: hlp2008

Reviews.Content: Will be back For our first time in Bali, we stayed at a pool suite at the St. Regis, and think that a pool villa would be a great option for when we have children. The pool villas are situated right on a pool lagoon that runs through most of the resort, and kids would love being able to get up and just jump into the pool lagoon. There is also another pool with an underwater bar. The pool suite was great with an outdoor plunge pool, Thai outdoor dining platform, Boffi-like egg bathtub, and toiletries by Remede. Would have been perfect if there was just a little more privacy when we were in our private outdoor courtyard which was part of our suite- people walking by outside would be able to peer in and we didn't feel like we had as much privacy as we would have liked. Service is good- the staff try very hard to please, and we were very happy with our personal butler, and the concierge. A few minor cons: 1) We wished there were more Balinese or Indonesian dishes on the menu, and 2) St Regis not the best place to watch the sunset. We caught it at Seminyak. A few shopping tips in seminyak: 1) uma and leopold- carries designs by bali-based designers as well as some australian designers like elissa coleman, and 2) knit- great jersey dresses and basics.
Reviews.Author: HopingThisHelps

Reviews.Content: Unforgettable, a dream like being in paradise       my private pool and bali bengong
Reviews.Author: chrimet

Reviews.Content: Superb service and you gotta love the breakfast We stayed at the St. Regis Bali from October 5 鈥?20. At the Bali Airport we were greeted and taken by an arrival assistance service to an airport lounge where we had refreshing beverages and snacks while our immigration papers were taken care off. Our transport to the hotel was a beautiful new Mercedes, and this was just the beginning of the pampering. Once we arrived to the hotel, we were greeted by a butler who escorted us to our villa, where we checked in. The villa was very elegantly decorated and spacious with a huge living/dining room, huge bedroom and bathroom, kitchen and additional toilet. The garden was even bigger with our own pool, outdoor shower, sun terrace and a covered Balinese day bed. This was heaven, or so I thought, before I tasted the breakfast the next day. Breakfast was truly fantastic, with most dishes freshly prepared when ordered. Servers and Chefs were constantly passing by our table with yummi goodies for us to try, while we were waiting for the food we had ordered. The hotel also has a Deli and another restaurant on the beach, which serves a lighter menu for lunch and a more fine-dining menu for dinner. Service throughout the resort was exceptionally good, very attentive and, as everywhere on Bali it seems, very friendly. This is a brand new hotel in Bali and a must try if you're heading that way.
Reviews.Author: tocata

Reviews.Content: Fantastic New St Regis Bali We stayed at the St. Regis Bali for four nights in October 2008. The transfer to the Hotel was smooth and included assistance in Clearing Immigration at the Airport (a huge timesaver), a comfortable transfer in the Hotels Mercedes Limousine and in-room check in on arrival. We were upgraded to a St Regis Pool Suite, comprising some 92 square metres of elegantly furnished living space, fronting onto a landscaped private garden which featured a sundeck, plunge pool and Bale. The room is very well appointed.The landscaping around the property is not yet established, as is to be expected with a new property. Nonetheless, the ambience of the hotel is excellent and a feature is certainly the large lagoon pool around which the Villas are set. Service in general was professional and very friendly and it is easy to see that the staff are making a big effort.In terms of dining, our experiences in Boneka Restaurant were very good. The breakfast is a definate highlight, with a large selection cooked fresh to order. Our only complaints would be in relation to the limited selection within the Minibar (although supplies are available from the Gourmand Deli), the lack of a conveniently located PowerPoint in the Bathroom for drying hair and the lack of water sports equipment on the beach (an area the management must improve as good watersports facilities are essential for a beach resort) . The beach / pool area would also benefit from more attentive service / amenities (i.e. cold towels, water spray and drinking water). Overall, our stay was an excellent experience and we will definately be returning to the resort again in the future.
Reviews.Author: RD4011

Reviews.Content: Excellency in Bali Dear Travelers,I've been in more than 400 hotels in 62 countries around the world and I would like to tell you that the newest St Regis Bali is a real must and an unforgettable stay. One of my best ones.Location is fantastic just in the beach.Rooms are so confortable that we want spend some time there.Facilities are lovely, gardens, a wonderful SPA, Bar and restaurants to spend the time we want., and very attractive pools.Food are the most delicious we can have be prepare to eat and eat since early in the morning till late in the night, food with high quality, presentation and so tasty.The Staff will make a great holiday to you they are fantastic professionals and with a high level of kindness.If you really want an hotel to rest and a fantastic place to stay please go to St Regis Bali and then write me to thank the information.Have a wonderful stay.
Reviews.Author: MCalvinho

Reviews.Content: A palace with genuinely warm staff St. Regis has a new property in Nusa Dua, Bali. The place is breathtaking and really shines in the evening that begins with a torch lighting accompanied by drums. The villas are tastefully designed and complete with bale gazebo and plunge pool in a tended garden. Every villa has an option for live-in butler service. We were given a tour and saw the deluxe suites which aren't a step away from luxury at all. They are as beautifully designed and over look the entire property. The service is cheerful and warm smiles greeting you everyday in every part of the resort. Concierge was more than helpful in all our inquiries for travel to other parts of Indonesia.Breakfast at Boneka overlooks the property and the sea with soothing Cafe del Mar type of music setting the mood for our honeymoon holiday. I had the best massage of many I had in Bali at the Remede Spa. St Regis Bali brings everything it knows and weds it harmoniously with the beauty of Bali; it made for my most exquisite stay during my two and a half week honeymoon traveling Indonesia.
Reviews.Author: shanticita

Reviews.Content: A new Jewel in Bali鈥檚 crown. We were met on arrival at the airport and quickly transferred to the hotel in a new Mercedes. Again we were met on arrival at the hotel where we took a moment to enjoy our welcome cocktail and absorb the stunning surroundings of the lobby area, then we were escorted to our suite. By this time our personal butler and luggage were ready and waiting. Perfect arrival experience.Our butler completed the check in formalities and explained the facilities and what great facilities they were. Our Pool Suite had a garden complete with day bed and plunge pool, we almost didn鈥檛 want to venture out.A few musts to enjoy were some of the sampling dishes at breakfast and pre diner drinks at King Cole Bar, followed by dinner at Kayuputi the beautiful restaurant overlooking the beach. Food was a gourmet delight and the service was excellent. I am normally a little hesitant at staying a newly opened Hotel but after only a few weeks of being opened the Hotel is well on its way to being one of the best .
Reviews.Author: haz68

Reviews.Content: A beautiful hotel and very friendly staff a few rough edges though A beautiful hotel that has opened in last month or so.Had Merc pick up from airport and seamless check in. Was then driven round resort in golf buggy and shown all facilities.Our room was lovely and new with large LCD, big lounge area and lovely pool and garden. Aircon worked very wellBed very comfortable.Food in restaurants very good though expensive and portions quite small. Their own brand bottle water was USD7 yet free in the room.Beach very nice though only 20 beach chairs which meant with people leaving towels on them we never got to use.Don鈥檛 try and order a drink after 18:00 by the beach as the bar closes and they expect the guest to walk themselves to the restaurant if they require a beverage. Was quite taken back when told I had to get my own drink from two staff.However staff were very friendly and genuinely warm though some of them seemed little inexperienced and two requests for a newspaper in restaurant and two requests for a baby chair for our dinner room service were never completed.A two hour extension request for late check out was greeted with a yes sir no problem which is nice. A number of other Starwood hotels I have stayed at have been far from accommodating in requests for even 1 hour extensions which can be difficult when travelling with an infant.I would definately return however I think a few more months when the management has had chance to further train staff and the plants and grasses have established themselves will allow this to be a 5/5 resort.
Reviews.Author: paulreg

Reviews.Content: The Unprepared St Regis Probably this hotel will be ready in another 6 months from now, but as is now, they should not charge the hotel like staying at the regular St Regis resort with its famous services. We stayed here for a night, but everything went wrong. First we found that our kitchenette in our lagoon villa was flooded with water coming from the AC. For 4 hours there were the maintenance guy with us in the villa. Secondly, during breakfast, they were trying so hard to deliver flawless service by offering all kind of bfast things just like in the Dim Sum place, that they forgot to deliver my husband's breakfast order. Then, the AC in the living room was so warm, even we set it as 15 deg Celcius. Then, lastly, the one that really made us disappointed, when we cancelled the luggage pickup service, when we left the room, they took all our luggage and bags and clothings and leave it up at front by the drop off area. Not recommended.
Reviews.Author: Svida
